thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com
thread.title: Donna

author: Donna
title: Donna
text: I have had great experiences with Thrift Books. I have shared my experience with friends. If I am going to purchase a book that is used I wouldn't consider buying from any other place. Books are always in good condition or excellent if they were on a scale. Many of the books I have purchased are sometimes 10 or more years old and the condition is still good. No writing, bent pages or stains.
